Package pt.uc.dei.filters

package pt.uc.dei.filters
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminAuthorizationFilter
    JAX-RS filter that restricts access to admin users only.
    AdminSelfOrManagerFilter
    JAX-RS filter that allows access only to the user themselves or an admin.
    AnotherAuthorizationFilter
    JAX-RS filter that denies access if the authenticated user attempts to access their own resource.
    AuthenticationFilter
    JAX-RS authentication filter for validating JWT tokens and user authentication.
    ManagerAuthorizationFilter
    JAX-RS filter that restricts access to managers or admins only.
    ManagerOfUserFilter
    JAX-RS filter that allows access only to the direct manager of the user specified by the endpoint id.
    RefreshCookieResponseFilter
    JAX-RS response filter to refresh authentication cookies unless logging out.
    SelfOrAdminAuthorizationFilter
    JAX-RS filter that allows access only to the user themselves or an admin.
